title: Inflation Plagues Democrats in Polling. Will It Crush Them at the Ballot Box?
description: Americans are extremely attuned to the cost of living, and as midterm election voters head to the polls, they are divided over whom to blame.
dc:creator: Jeanna Smialek
media:credit: Sarah Blesener for The New York Times
media:description: Voters casting their ballots in Brooklyn on Tuesday. Economic issues are among the top worries heading into the midterms.
